# Filth Fever
## Overview
**Type:** disease, injury

**Save:** Fortitude DC 12

**Onset:** 1d3 days

**Frequency:** 1/day

**Effect:** 1d3 Dex damage and 1d3 Con damage

**Cure:** 2 consecutive saves
